name: Meow Miner
description:
he Cat Embassy announced the latest news!

The Cat Aeronautic and Space Agency confirmed that an Exploration Ship along with 14 crews and 1 captain will be dispatched to deeply prospect the geology in Kaka Planet of Meow Galaxy.

The most advanced radar scanning system has been equipped on the Exploration Ship. After the ship lands on Kaka Planet, the ship can try to contact with the nearby indigenous cats!


- 11 galaxies
- More than 70 planets are waiting!
- Dozens of ores, relics and treasures are waiting!

Contact us : eggcall@126.com
